Package model.board

Interface ControlCheck

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControlCheckImpl
public interface ControlCheck
In chess, no move can be made that makes the king, of the player who is moving, checkmate. this rule is handled by this class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Position>
    controlledMoves(Chessboard chessboard, Piece piece)
    It is illegal to move your king into check.
    boolean
    isInCheck(Chessboard chessboard, Side color)
    This method checks if the king is in check, according to the color.
    boolean
    isInCheckWithoutKing(Chessboard chessboard, Side color)
    This method checks if the king is in check according to the color, without checking whether the opposing king is attacking the king in question.

  • Method Details

    • controlledMoves

      List<Position> controlledMoves(Chessboard chessboard, Piece piece)
      It is illegal to move your king into check. this method checks these illegal moves and removes them from the available moves
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard where the moves must be controlled
      piece - the piece to which have to check the moves
      Returns:
      The list of positions representing all legal moves

    • isInCheckWithoutKing

      boolean isInCheckWithoutKing(Chessboard chessboard, Side color)
      This method checks if the king is in check according to the color, without checking whether the opposing king is attacking the king in question.
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard in which to check whether the king is in check
      color - The color of the king to check if it is in check
      Returns:
      boolean

    • isInCheck

      boolean isInCheck(Chessboard chessboard, Side color)
      This method checks if the king is in check, according to the color.
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard in which to check whether the king is in check
      color - The color of the king to check if it is in check
      Returns:
      boolean
